exercises.name: Cardio Blast
exercises.description: A high-intensity cardio workout to burn calories.

exercises.name: HIIT Session
exercises.description: Quick and intense bursts with rest periods.

exercises.name: Yoga Basics
exercises.description: Yoga poses that enhance core strength and balance.

exercises.name: Stability Ball Exercises
exercises.description: Workouts using a stability ball to improve balance.

exercises.name: Squat Mastery
exercises.description: Master various squat variations to build strength in your quads, glutes, and hamstrings.

exercises.name: Glute Gains
exercises.description: Target your glutes with exercises like hip thrusts and glute bridges for maximum activation.

exercises.name: Endurance Runs
exercises.description: Gradually increase your running distance to improve cardiovascular health and endurance.

exercises.name: Stair Climbing
exercises.description: Stair climbing is an effective way to build leg strength and cardiovascular endurance.

exercises.name: Core Conditioning
exercises.description: Strengthen your core with a mix of planks, Russian twists, and leg raises.

exercises.name: Ab Blast
exercises.description: Incorporate high-intensity interval training focused on the abdominal area to burn fat and tone the core.

exercises.name: Sprint Intervals
exercises.description: Boost your speed with short, high-intensity sprint intervals.

exercises.name: Resistance Running
exercises.description: Use resistance bands or parachutes to increase running resistance, improving stride power and speed.

exercises.name: Bodyweight Mastery
exercises.description: Advance through progressively challenging bodyweight exercises such as pull-ups, push-ups, and dips to increase muscle strength.

exercises.name: Weightlifting Power
exercises.description: Master weightlifting with exercises like squats, deadlifts, and bench presses to build foundational strength.

exercises.name: Circuit Training
exercises.description: Engage in high-repetition circuit training to tone muscles and improve cardiovascular health.

exercises.name: Pilates Core and More
exercises.description: Focus on Pilates exercises that target the core while also toning the arms and legs for a full-body effect.

exercises.name: Progressive Overload
exercises.description: Focus on progressively increasing the weight you lift to continually challenge your muscles and stimulate growth.

exercises.name: Hypertrophy-Specific Training
exercises.description: Engage in workouts specifically designed for muscle growth, targeting different muscle groups with high volume and moderate weight.
